details: d3 doses. Heals d6 HP, +1 on all abilities for d6 rounds, then -1 until rest
Slow but quiet flight. Attack and defense tests are +4DR while flying
d6+2 HP, bite d4, only obeys you*
Floods 20mm area with fake data for d4 minutes, making remote communication and surveillance impossible
Good enough to pass a random check, might not work if they are looking for you
with d3 slots and 2 random apps
